Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Action | Crime | Drama | Mystery | Romance/Dating | Thriller
Status: Canceled/Ended

Blue Heelers is a character-based drama about police officers in a country town. The young team of police are the focus of the stories, the impact of events on each of them and their loved ones are the heart of the series. We watch their successes and their failures and learn to grow with them. The series is the one of Australia's most successful dramas.


(http://www.tvrage.com/Blue_Heelers)
Hey OZFox42 do you have the whole 13 Series of Blue Heelers? if so why not upload as a complete series at a time. I have been after this for a donkeys age.
